_header: Everlasting love to me I have taken
Note:
Formerly 735; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 390; cf. 1219.
_description: Humfrey Newton, an acrostic to Elin — one quatrain

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
Euerlastynge lof I hold it best to me I han tan& be ye
                    stidfastleyn me your hert to haue in hold kepynge me rauesshed &
                    takeye han myn hert so haue I restneuer to foresak you while my lif
                    may laouer tyme
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Poems of Humphrey Newton, Esquire, 1466-1536.” 
             PMLA
         65 (1950): 249-81: 262 (note).
